preqs: LAW1100 or LAW1101 and LAW1102 or LAW1104

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE NOT IN {1074} Do Must be enrolled in course owned by {50000567} Otherwise true
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {LAW1100, LAW1102, LAW1104}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {LAW1100, LAW1102, LAW1104}
For COURSE_CODE NOT IN {1074} Do Must be enrolled in course owned by {50000567} Otherwise true

description: Topics include: an overview of international organisations and the role they play in the development of international law; the sources of international institutional law; the United Nations, including the General Assembly; the Security Council, peacekeeping operations and human rights; global judicial bodies including the International Court of Justice and War Crimes Tribunals; international economic organisations including the IMF and the World (IBRD); regional organisations particularly APEC; the effectiveness of international organisations including enforcement issues and prospects for reform.
